name: Story Architect Project
summary: A STARC file is a project created by Story Architect, an open-source program for writing scripts, such as screenplays, comic books, and stage plays. It contains one or more story projects, which include script text, character information, location information, and the cover image. Story Architect users often save their work as STARC files to keep track of their progress, and the app may also automatically create backups of your projects in this format.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
